Configurations

This is a set of utilities that allows you to create XML-based configurations and turn them into a working environment. At startup for your application, the configuration is read, processed and the environment is created. Options also include a bootstrapping mechanism for servlets, so a servlet can have a configuration.

Features

Configurations support the following
